desc: The act of going from one place to another, usually over a distance.
example: I love to travel and explore new cultures.

desc: The business or activity of traveling for pleasure.
example: Tourism is an important part of the local economy.

desc: A place where people stay when traveling.
example: We stayed in a cozy hotel by the sea.

desc: A book of information about a place for tourists.
example: He read the guidebook before visiting Rome.

desc: The act of arranging travel or accommodation in advance.
example: I made the booking online last night.

desc: Bags and suitcases you take on a trip.
example: Her luggage was lost at the airport.

desc: An official document allowing a person to travel abroad.
example: Don’t forget your passport before leaving!

desc: A place where airplanes take off and land.
example: They arrived at the airport two hours early.
Our flight to Paris was delayed.

desc: A person who travels for pleasure.
example: The city was full of tourists in the summer.
